materials.raw_text: Acetate (Ac): 50 g, Barium Carbonate (Ba): 80 g, Sodium Carbonate (Na): 30 g, Lead Oxide (Pb): 120 g

sourcing.instructions: Acetate can be sourced from chemical supply stores or online retailers. Barium Carbonate is available at specialty chemical suppliers or online. Sodium Carbonate can be found at grocery stores (as washing soda) or chemical suppliers. Lead Oxide must be sourced from specialized chemical suppliers with proper safety regulations.

preparation.raw_text:

 2. Add 80 g of Barium Carbonate to the container.

 4. Finally, add 120 g of Lead Oxide.
